strapiPost.title: 3rd Annual SOAR NWA Dates Announced
strapiPost.content:
Open Avenues announced the 3rd annual SOAR NWA event will take place August 26-27 at the Drake Field in Fayetteville. 

  • Up and away: SOAR NWA is the regionâ€™s hot air balloon festival with various aeronautic activities for all ages. There will be a play zone for kiddos, a beer garden for those 21+, and activities like helicopter rides and discovery flights available for booking. 
  • Money well spent: The event is officially a fundraiser that enables Open Avenues to provide employment opportunities for people with disabilities. Both one and two-day ticket options are available, and tickets purchased in advance are $15 for adults and $5 for kids.

For tickets and more information, click HERE.
